Attacks.Name: Aeroblast
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Lugia gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: If a wild is rolled, the target is Pushed S.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stun special condition. After this attack is resolved, Lugia may advance M.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Multiscale
Superpowers.Effect: The first time Lugia would suffer damage each round, reduce the damage suffered by 1.

Superpowers.Name: Sky Guardian
Superpowers.Effect: Place Lugia within Range 2 of its current location. After being placed, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Future Sight
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character suffers 1 additional damage during the next round's Power Phase.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Rain
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Lugia or an allied character within Range 3.
